quest: How many ski centres are there in Scotland?
quest_zh: 蘇格蘭有多少個滑雪中心？

quest: The role and membership of the House of Lords has changed over the last 50 years
quest_zh: 在過去的50年中，上議院的角色和會員資格發生了變化

quest: The devolved governments do not have the power to legislate on any issues but can advise and encourage
quest_zh: 權威的政府無權就任何問題立法，但可以鼓勵和鼓勵

quest: Who receives ambassadors and high commissioners, entertains visiting heads of state and makes state visits overseas in support of diplomatic and economic relationships with other countries?
quest_zh: 誰接待了大使和高級專員，招待訪問國家元首，並在海外進行州訪問以支持與其他國家的外交和經濟關係？

quest: Forced Marriage Protection Orders were introduced in 2008 for England, Wales and Northern Ireland
quest_zh: 2008年為英格蘭，威爾士和北愛爾蘭引入了強迫結婚命令

quest: It is illegal for shops and businesses to not accept the banknotes of Northern Ireland and Scotland
quest_zh: 商店和企業不接受北愛爾蘭和蘇格蘭的鈔票是非法的

quest: Civil servants cannot stand for Office
quest_zh: 公務員不能替代辦公室

quest: What do the Brit Awards celebrate?
quest_zh: 英國大獎慶祝什麼？

quest: What is the minimum age for serving on a jury?
quest_zh: 陪審團服役的最低年齡是多少？

quest: The Speaker is an MP, he/she represents a constituency and deals with constituents' problems like any other MP
quest_zh: 演講者是國會議員，他/她代表一個選區，並且像其他國會議員一樣處理選民的問題

quest: Which king defeated the Vikings?
quest_zh: 哪個國王擊敗了維京人？

quest: What does Eid al-Fitr celebrate?
quest_zh: Eid al-Fitr慶祝什麼？

answers.answer: That the prophet Ibrahim was willing to sacrifice his son when God ordered him to
answers.answer_zh: 先知易卜拉欣願意犧牲他的兒子

answers.answer: The founding of the Muslim community

quest: In which year did the UK join the European Union (EU)?
quest_zh: 英國加入了歐盟（EU）的哪一年？

quest: What is the highest denomination of coins one can find in the UK?
quest_zh: 在英國可以找到的硬幣的最高姓名是什麼？

quest: The Lake District is the largest national park in Scotland
quest_zh: 湖區是蘇格蘭最大的國家公園

quest: You are not responsible for cleaning up after your pet in public places
quest_zh: 您不負責在寵物在公共場所進行清理

quest: People who are self-employed need to pay National Insurance Contributions themselves
quest_zh: 自僱人士需要支付國家保險供款的人

quest: The Speaker is elected by fellow MPs using the open ballot system
quest_zh: 揚聲器由國會議員使用公開投票系統選舉

quest: The Monarch appoints the members of the Cabinet
quest_zh: 君主任命內閣成員

quest: What is the minimum age for going into betting shops or gambling clubs?
quest_zh: 進入博彩商店或賭博俱樂部的最低年齡是多少？

quest: What are elected members of the National Assembly of Wales known as?
quest_zh: 威爾士國民議會的民選成員被稱為什麼？

quest: Which TWO are safe places to go and stay in for anyone facing domestic violence?
quest_zh: 哪個是安全的地方，要陪伴面臨家庭暴力的任何人？

quest: When did a group of Catholics led by Guy Fawkes fail in their plan to kill the Protestant king with a bomb in the Houses of Parliament?
quest_zh: 蓋伊·福克斯（Guy Fawkes）領導的一群天主教徒何時未能在議會大廈殺死新教國王的計劃？

quest: How many national parks are there in England, Wales and Scotland?
quest_zh: 英格蘭，威爾士和蘇格蘭有多少個國家公園？
